data.eml:eml: Two new species of Gaeolaelaps (Acari: Laelapidae) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nemati, Alireza, Mohseni, Mastaneh (2013): Two new species of Gaeolaelaps (Acari: Laelapidae) from Iran. Zootaxa 3750 (1): 71-82, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3750.1.5
